NEW ROUTES TO SAUDI ARABIA 🇸🇦
We’re thrilled to announce a brand new destination in the WIZZ network, Dammam! From September, you’ll have the chance to travel to this Saudi Arabian city all the way from Abu Dhabi, Vienna or Rome with WIZZ. Book now on https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF! https://t.co/b9bCX9m7qO

data.text: Want to get a taste of the UK's history? Now's your chance to catch an epic retelling of the Queen's 70 years of reign at the Platinum Jubilee Pageant in London, and to eat with locals at street festivals as part of the Big Jubilee Lunch, both held on 5 June. Book a ticket now! https://t.co/dPL1O2pkUJ

data.text: Strbacki buk is a hidden gem in the heart of Eastern Europe. The beautiful waterfall is just a few hours' drive from Banja Luka and it’s located in the equally impressive Una National Park. What a sight! Grab your ticket now and see for yourself! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/hIVMn8WUZJ

data.text: At 1247ft (380m), the Krimml in Austria is Central Europe’s highest waterfall. Just two hours from Salzburg and with several beautiful drops, exciting walking paths and impressive panoramic views, Krimml is a must-see! Book a ticket and see for yourself!👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/ceEi7Aj3M0

data.text: Iceland has countless beautiful waterfalls, but even amongst those Skógafoss stands out. The spectacular waterfall is just two hours away from Reykjavik and it’s one of the most Instagrammable spots in the country. Book your ticket and see for yourself! 👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/puFC2vtzDg

data.text: A pleasant day trip from Reykjavík, Gullfoss is one of Europe’s most unique waterfalls. With two massive drops, it’s simply breathtaking. But we’ll let the picture speak for itself. An unmissable sight for sure! Grab your ticket now and see for yourself!👉 https://t.co/AeMNWOJWFF https://t.co/zvAgadyHtc

Did you know that many French bakeries don't make their croissants from scratch? Sacre bleu! We travelled to Nice to meet the man championing artisanal, handmade pastries in Nice. Talk about flour power. Read more in the current issue of WIZZ magazine.
https://t.co/lRKOXPafrU https://t.co/h78wcHqopM

data.text: If you're all finished being amazed by the natural beauties of the Canary Islands, take a little break & visit La Laguna. ✨ The UNESCO World Heritage Site is an enchanting town with gorgeous buildings dating back to the 15th century!
